Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Hyper Targeting Chip^reset; to me at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
Good job. The fact that you survived that firepower says much of your prowess in battle. I would not want to mess with you.
On ^orange;Cyber Spheres^reset; or ^orange;Wasteland^reset; planets there often walk dangerous battle machines known as ^orange;War Bots^reset;. Take one down, and I'll pay you well.
